nodes.text: The wrecked AT-AT that Jaden Korr found on Hoth was unusually guarded for an "old pile of junk", as Korr noted, being guarded by an E-web cannon, a Viper probe droid, and numerous snowtroopers. Having beaten the opposition in the area, Korr learned that the wrecked AT-AT was actually an entrance into the remains of Echo Base.
